original_text: Its side rooms, its jambs, and its vestibule were of the same size as the others, and it had windows all around. Its length was fifty cubits, and its breadth twenty-five cubits.
korean_text: 길이가 쉰 척이요 너비가 스물다섯 척이며 그 문지기 방과 벽과 현관이 다 그러하여 그 좌우에도 창이 있으며

sentences.original_text: Its side rooms, its jambs, and its vestibule were of the same size as the others
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 골방, 문설주, 그리고 현관은 다른 것들과 같은 크기였습니다

sentences.original_text: and it had windows all around
